/home/jkavuncuoglu/Projects/loan-shield/.baseContent:
# Audit Sidebar (Vue 3)

SEO & UX audit sidebar components for Vue 3. Ships as a plugin or named components. Optional minimal CSS is provided if you don't use Tailwind.

Install
- npm: npm i @your-scope/audit-sidebar
- pnpm: pnpm add @your-scope/audit-sidebar
- yarn: yarn add @your-scope/audit-sidebar

Global registration (plugin)

changes.oldContent: Without Tailwind, you can import the included fallback CSS:
- 📑 Duplicate meta detection works per-page; cross-page analysis is out of scope.
State not saving? Check if browser storage (localStorage) is enabled.

changes.content: If you use Tailwind, the components will automatically pick up utility classes.
Without Tailwind, you can import the included fallback CSS:
- State not saving? Check if browser storage (localStorage) is enabled.

changes.oldContent: 📑 Duplicate meta detection works per-page; cross-page analysis is out of scope.
Without Tailwind, you can import the included fallback CSS:
- Vue version mismatch? Requires Vue 3 (Composition API).
- Sidebar not styled? Ensure you’ve imported style.css or have Tailwind set up.

changes.content: - 🔍 Link checks are heuristic-only (no cross-origin fetches in browser).
- 📑 Duplicate meta detection works per-page; cross-page analysis is out of scope.
- Sidebar not styled? Ensure you’ve imported style.css or have Tailwind set up.
- Vue version mismatch? Requires Vue 3 (Composition API).

changes.content: - Sidebar not styled? Ensure you’ve imported style.css or have Tailwind set up.
A modular Vue 3 sidebar for quick **Content SEO** and **User Experience (UX)** audits.
It runs safe, client-side heuristics and shows **pass / warn / fail** statuses with actionable guidance.
- 🌐 Contrast & mobile-friendly checks use basic heuristics; for production audits, pair with Lighthouse or dedicated SEO tools.
